Plot: A crew of African American pilots in the Tuskegee training program, having faced segregation while kept mostly on the ground during World War II, are called into duty under the guidance of Col. A.J. Bullard.
Title: Red Tails
Writer: John Ridley (story), John Ridley (screenplay), Aaron McGruder (screenplay), John B. Holway (book)
Actors: Terrence Howard, Cuba Gooding Jr., Nate Parker, David Oyelowo
tomatoConsensus: Despite a worthy fact-based story and obvious good intentions, Red Tails suffers from one-dimensional characters, corny dialogue, and heaps of clichés.
